game.name: Guardener
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: An arcade strategy game about defending your garden. Grow potatoes, onions and carrots to defend your lawn!
game.shortDescriptionEn: An arcade strategy game about defending your garden. Grow potatoes, onions and carrots to defend your lawn!

reviewHighlights.text: Great game. It takes a while to get the hang of it, but you eventually figure it out. With that said, there’s an awful bug that happens quite often: A...
게임이 엄청 귀여워요. 난이도도 굉장히 쉬운편입니다만, 스테이지가 많지 않아서 아쉬움이 있습니다.
